solution_line_template: First find the total floor area Jack needs to mop: {bathroom_area} sq ft + {kitchen_area} sq ft = <<{bathroom_area}+{kitchen_area}={total_area_to_mop}>>{total_area_to_mop} sq ft

Then divide the total area that needs to be mopped by Jack's mopping rate: {total_area_to_mop} sq ft / {mopping_rate} sq ft/minute = <<{total_area_to_mop}/{mopping_rate}={time_spent_mopping}>>{time_spent_mopping} minutes
